job_history.work_description: Overseeing 6 early child education centers located in Long Island New York. Focused on improving financial results, elevating program quality & brand recognition and building team engagement.

Caring for the health, welfare, diet, and nurture of the children while they are in the center; curriculum and program development; recruiting, training, and supervising staff; to plan, coordinate and lead the activities and learning of the Child Care Center, and maintaining records.
Overseeing nine franchise owned schools. Responsible for collecting monthly financial reports as well as conducting audits of child care manager, bank deposits, and employee & student files.

Caring for the health, welfare, diet, and nurture of the children while they are in the center; curriculum and program development; recruiting, training, and supervising staff; to plan, coordinate and lead the activities and learning of the Child Care Center, and maintaining records as required by the department of Public Welfare.
Teaching science, math computers and art to sixth seventh and eighth graders. Writing lesson plans, planned creative projects and monitored students behavior.

Opening and closing the school. Monitoring the school to make sure we were in compliance with state child care and health laws. Training and monitoring staff on a daily basis. Writing curriculum for academic programs for ages two through six that built reading and writing skills.

Implementing the treatment plan for children with various disabilities including autism. Working one on one with an autistic child. Collaborating with a team of individuals in developing the best approach to implementing the treatment plan.
Implementing and the work plan of the absent teacher. Overseeing activities of students and maintaining a safe learning atmosphere.
Supporting the manager in the duties of the kiosk. Displaying and selling merchandise to customer. Helping achieve stores sales goals.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has held various leadership roles, including District Manager, Director, and Area Manager, with extensive experience in overseeing teams and managing operations.

skills.name: Program Development
skills.explanation: Has experience in developing curriculum and programs for child care centers and academic programs, demonstrating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in recruiting, training, and supervising staff, as well as building team engagement, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in collecting monthly financial reports and conducting audits, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Child Care Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in managing child care centers, including caring for children, developing programs, and maintaining records, demonstrating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Teaching
skills.explanation: Has experience in teaching science, math, computers, and art to sixth, seventh, and eighth graders, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Curriculum Development
skills.explanation: Has experience in writing curriculum for academic programs, demonstrating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Staff Training
skills.explanation: Has experience in training and monitoring staff, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Sales
skills.explanation: Has experience in selling merchandise to customers as an Assistant Store Manager, indicating some practical experience.
